frameDefinitions: An Entity aids in the successful completion of a Purpose.
A particular Binding_principle is (or is not) operative, that is, any obligations, restrictions, and any other aspects of the Binding_principle are (or are not) in effect.
These are words referring to control by a Leader over a particular entity  or group (the Governed) or an Activity.

Against the background of a contextually salient non-real world, for instance a hypothetical, imagined, simulated, expected, projected, or dream world, an Instance of a Type encountered in a relation or event in the real world is presented as being different from the instance found in the non-real world.
A Phenomenon is related to some cognitive action, the Endeavor, of a Cognizer.

A Factor affects the outcome of an Undertaking, which  can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a Field, or something portrayed as affecting an Interested_party.
frameExamples: A box is an <t>ideal</t> storage device.
This law will only become in <t>effect</t> during the last three weeks of the year.
Sebek em hat was a <t>Leader</t> of Priests. ca. 1780 BC
This book is very <t>relevant</t> to my essay.
Temperature is the most <t>critical</t> factor in successful storage.
listRoleDefinitions: The item which is useful for some purpose.
The kind of task which is promoted by the use or presence of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
When the <fen>Entity</fen> is useful for a <fen>Purpose</fen>.
The <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is the law, contract, principle, or other (set of) obligations that is (or is not) operational.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is in effect.
The <fen>Place</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is or is not operational.

The <fen>Leader</fen> is the one who has the role of leading.  With verbs, and with predicate nominals linking an individual to a <fen>Role</fen>, the <fen>Leader</fen> is usually the External Argument:

The role played by the <fen>Leader</fen> in a given situation, often an official title; incorporated in most noun LUsin this frame. When expressed separately from the target, <fen>Role</fen> usually occurs in a PP Complement headed by <ment>as</ment>.
The entity whose actions or beliefs the <fen>Leader</fen> directs in the context of a joint activity or movement.  This entity can be a political body, a person, or a group of people.
The <fen>Leader</fen> directs the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<fen>Time</fen> refers to the point in time that the leadership took place.
The locale from which the <fen>Leader</fen> leads the <fen>Governed</fen> or the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The real-world individual--a concrete or abstract thing or an event--which differs from its counterpart in a discourse-salient non-real world.
A kind of entity, instances of which are expected to occur in both the real and the non-real world.
Something that is profiled in the mind of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> as being related to mental <fen>Endeavor</fen>s.
A cognitive action (eg discussion, decision) performed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is connected in some way.
A participant in the mental <fen>Endeavor</fen> to which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is related. This frame element is often null-instantiated and may be inferred from the <fen>Endeavor</fen>.
<fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed.
The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake.
<fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important.
listRoleExamples: Once <fex>the treaty</fex> is in effect, US port authorities and the Coast Guard will monitor compliance by checking any yacht 79 feet or longer.
All patent applicants and owners should be aware of the current uncertainty as to what patent fees will be in effect <fex>on October 1, 1998</fex>
This promotion is void <fex>in the state of Florida</fex>.
The general led his troops into battle <fex>on June 22, 1883</fex>.
He ruled the west <fex>from his palace in Milan</fex>.
In May of 1994, FBI agents working for Mr. Fiske interviewed Mrs. Foster, showed her <fex>an ACTUAL  gun</fex>, not a photo, and asked her if she could identify the gun.
<fex>Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> is important to most people.
Temperature is the most critical factor <fex>in successful storage</fex>.
Being sure they are buying fresh food is important <fex>to most people</fex>.
A successful GATT round is important <fex>for the world economy</fex>.
